- Connect your existing network to your VPC using IPsec connection
- This is a regional service
	- choose the one that's closest to your other site
- only P2P
- allows [[Private Google Access]] to extend to on prem hosts
- 3GB per tunnel
- dynamic and static routing
- supports IKEv1 and IKEv2
-
- Classic VPN
	- 99.9%
	- static and dynamic
	- 1 interface and 1 external IP
	- deprecating some functionality in 2021
- HA VPN
	- 99.99% when configured with two interfaces and two IPs
	- dynamic only through BGP
	- 2 external IPs and 2 Interfaces
	- new default VPN
	- you need two on prem (or other network) IP gateway
- When?
	- you need public internet access
	- peering location is not available in your area
	- budget constraints [[GCP Interconnect]] is more $
	- high speeds not needed
	- only have regular outgoing trafic from GCP
-
